text: Lars Frykberg, born 3 January 1957, is a Swedish former cross-country skier. He won Vasaloppet in 1982. at the time, he competed for IFK Mora. in a competition where Jean-Paul Pierrat from France first reached the finish. However, Jean-Paul Pierrat was disqualified for changing skis (which was not allowed). He also won Worldloppet in the seasons of 1981/1982 and 1982/1983. == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish skiers
title: Lasse Frykberg
